participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Creative and compassionate with a quirky sense of humor. Enjoys the simple pleasures of life like nature and animals.
participant_1.background: i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. i am an animal activist. my age is too old to say.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Intellectual and curious with a warm demeanor. Loves sharing knowledge and exploring new cultures.
participant_2.background: i've a big library at home. i am a museum tour guide. i am partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea.
